title: Implement SQLite database setup with schema
description: Create SQLite database with the denormalized schema from SPEC.md including tweets, collections, thread_context, sync_progress, and metadata tables with proper indexes.
close_reason: Implemented SQLite database with all tables (tweets, collections, sync_progress, thread_context, metadata) and indexes per SPEC.md

title: Implement reposts sync
description: Implement sync reposts command with pagination, count limits, --all flag, and incremental sync.

title: Implement checkpointing for resumable syncs
description: Implement SyncCheckpoint class to save/load/clear sync progress using sync_progress table. Enable resume after interruption or rate limiting.

title: Implement stats command
description: Show sync statistics: counts per collection, last sync times, total tweets, database size. Use rich for formatted table output.

title: Implement JSON export
description: Export tweets to JSON format with collection filtering and output path option. Include author info, metrics, media URLs, and quoted tweets.

title: Implement Markdown export
description: Export tweets to Markdown format with collection filtering. Include author, date, content, and link to original tweet.

title: Implement HTML export
description: Create single self-contained HTML viewer with inline CSS/JS, embedded tweet data, filtering/search, works offline.

title: Implement Firefox cookie extraction
description: Read auth_token and ct0 cookies directly from Firefox cookies.sqlite file (unencrypted). Support multiple profiles with auto-detection.
close_reason: Implemented Firefox cookie extraction with auto-detection of most recent cookies.sqlite across standard and snap locations

title: Implement Chrome cookie extraction with keyring
description: Extract and decrypt auth_token and ct0 from Chrome Cookies DB using secretstorage for GNOME Keyring or KDE Wallet decryption on Linux.

title: Implement cookie resolution flow with fallbacks
description: Implement priority-based cookie resolution: 1) env vars, 2) config file, 3) Firefox auto-extract, 4) Chrome auto-extract. Clear error messages for missing/expired cookies.
close_reason: Implemented cookie resolution flow with priority-based fallbacks: 1) env vars, 2) config file, 3) Firefox auto-extract. Raises CookieError with clear message when no cookies found.

title: Implement Twitter client base with headers
description: Create base TwitterClient class with proper HTTP headers, auth handling, and httpx async client setup. Port from bird twitter-client-base.ts.

title: Implement query ID management
description: Implement baseline query IDs in constants, runtime cache in ~/.config/tweethoarder/query-ids-cache.json, auto-refresh on 404, and 24h TTL. Port from bird runtime-query-ids.ts.

title: Implement likes sync with pagination
description: Implement sync likes command with cursor-based pagination, count limits, --all flag, progress display, and incremental sync support.

title: Implement bookmarks sync with folders
description: Implement sync bookmarks command with folder support, pagination, and incremental sync. Track bookmark_folder_id and bookmark_folder_name.

title: Implement user tweets sync
description: Implement sync tweets command for user's own tweets with pagination, count limits, --all flag, and incremental sync.
